languages.text: "Когда он заболел, он стал бояться этих надписей. Их появлялось все больше. "Покаяние, покаяние, покаяние". Даже в его спальне они были! Один раз он показал на эту надпись рукой... и что-то сказал... что-то очень странное... Про мертвые глаза. И про кобр, которые ходят в класс".

"When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."
languages.original_text: "Когда он заболел, он стал бояться этих надписей. Их появлялось все больше. "Покаяние, покаяние, покаяние". Даже в его спальне они были! Один раз он показал на эту надпись рукой... и что-то сказал... что-то очень странное... Про мертвые глаза. И про кобр, которые ходят в класс".

traits.locale_text: "When he became sick, those writings started to scare him. There were more and more of them. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about snakes going to class."

"When he became sick, those writings started to scare him. There were more and more of them. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about snakes going to class."

"When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about snakes going to class."

"When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about snakes going to class."

"When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

languages.text: “他生病的时候，那些字开始让他感到害怕。那些字变得越来越多，甚至连他的卧室里都出现了！有一次，他指着那个字……说了些话……那些话非常奇怪……他说有死人的眼睛，还说眼镜蛇是鸡。”
languages.original_text: "When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

traits.locale_text: “他生病的时候，那些字开始让他感到害怕。那些字变得越来越多，甚至连他的卧室里都出现了！有一次，他指着那个字……说了些话……那些话非常奇怪……他说有死人的眼睛，还说眼镜蛇是鸡。”

languages.text: «Cuando se puso malito, esa palabra empezó a darle miedo. Aparecía cada vez más veces. "Arrepentimiento, arrepentimiento, arrepentimiento". ¡Hasta en su habitación! Una vez, la señaló... y dijo algo... algo muy raro... sobre ojos muertos. Y sobre cobras que fregaban clases...».
languages.original_text: "When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando se puso malito, esa palabra empezó a darle miedo. Aparecía cada vez más veces. "Arrepentimiento, arrepentimiento, arrepentimiento". ¡Hasta en su habitación! Una vez, la señaló... y dijo algo... algo muy raro... sobre ojos muertos. Y sobre cobras que fregaban clases...».

languages.text: 「病気になってから、あの落書きを見て怖がるようになっちゃった。どんどん出てくるんだもん。『リペンタンス、リペンタンス、リペンタンス』って。おじいちゃんの寝室にも出てきたんだよ！ある時、おじいちゃんが落書きを指差して…なんか…変なことを言ったの…死んだ目、とか。あと、コブラがクラスに出るって」
languages.original_text: "When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

traits.locale_text: 「病気になってから、あの落書きを見て怖がるようになっちゃった。どんどん出てくるんだもん。『リペンタンス、リペンタンス、リペンタンス』って。おじいちゃんの寝室にも出てきたんだよ！ある時、おじいちゃんが落書きを指差して…なんか…変なことを言ったの…死んだ目、とか。あと、コブラがクラスに出るって」

languages.text: "Als er krank wurde, hat ihm die Schrift Angst gemacht. Sie tauchte immer öfter auf. 'Repentanz, Repentanz, Repentanz.' Sogar in seinem Schlafzimmer! Einmal hat er auf das Wort gedeutet ... und etwas gesagt ... etwas sehr Merkwürdiges ... Über tote Augen. Und über Kobras, die in die Klasse gehen."
languages.original_text: "When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

traits.locale_text: "Als er krank wurde, hat ihm die Schrift Angst gemacht. Sie tauchte immer öfter auf. 'Repentanz, Repentanz, Repentanz.' Sogar in seinem Schlafzimmer! Einmal hat er auf das Wort gedeutet ... und etwas gesagt ... etwas sehr Merkwürdiges ... Über tote Augen. Und über Kobras, die in die Klasse gehen."

languages.text: « Quand il est tombé malade, les mots ont commencé à lui faire peur. Il y en avait de plus en plus. "Repentance, repentance, repentance." Même dans sa chambre ! Une fois, il a montré ce mot du doigt... et il a dit quelque chose... quelque chose de vraiment bizarre... à propos d'yeux morts et de cobras qui vont en classe. »
languages.original_text: "When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

traits.locale_text: « Quand il est tombé malade, les mots ont commencé à lui faire peur. Il y en avait de plus en plus. "Repentance, repentance, repentance." Même dans sa chambre ! Une fois, il a montré ce mot du doigt... et il a dit quelque chose... quelque chose de vraiment bizarre... à propos d'yeux morts et de cobras qui vont en classe. »

languages.text: "Hasta olunca o yazılardan korkmaya başladı. Yazılar da gitgide artmaya başladı. 'Tövbe, tövbe, tövbe.' Yatak odasında bile belirdiler! Bir keresinde o kelimeyi gösterip bir şey demişti... Çok tuhaftı. Ölü gözlerle ilgiliydi. Bir de sınıfa giren kobralarla."
languages.original_text: "When he got sick, the writing started to scare him. More and more of it appeared. 'Repentance, repentance, repentance.' Even in his bedroom! One time, he pointed at that word... and said something... something very weird... About dead eyes. And about cobras going to class."

traits.locale_text: "Hasta olunca o yazılardan korkmaya başladı. Yazılar da gitgide artmaya başladı. 'Tövbe, tövbe, tövbe.' Yatak odasında bile beliriyorlardı. Bir keresinde o kelimeyi gösterip bir şey demişti... Çok tuhaftı. Ölü gözlerle ilgiliydi. Kobraların sınıfa girmesi gibi bir şeydi."
